zenCSS Components

The zen test

We've automatically enabled the "zen test" mode on this page to help you visualize our container, row and columns. You can toggle it on and off below. The orange boxes are for text, with paragraphs having a 1px solid line. For titles, we move to a 2px outline - h1 has a dotted line and any h2-h6 has a solid orangel line. To top it off, we've run a grey line down the middle.

The Zen Test

Every part, section, and modifier we ship will pass alignment, styling, and functional tests to ensure they perform flawlessly in today's modern browsers

So you can be assured it "just works".
